Key Match Events: Livingstone carried England to the brink of victory with a superb 87 off 47 deliveries, including five sixes and six fours.
Brydon Carse senselessly slogged in the air next ball to give Short, who had previously only taken two international wickets, his maiden professional five-for.
Adil Rashid steered to backward point for the single England needed for a three-wicket win with six balls to spare at Cardiff.
